description: Detects suspicious sub processes started by the ScreenConnect client service, which indicates the use of the so-called Backstage mode Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Case in which administrators are allowed to use ScreenConnect's Backstage mode
name: ScreenConnect Backstage Mode Anomaly
